com.github.misberner.apcommons.util.methods

Class ParameterInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.misberner.apcommons.util.methods.ParameterInfo

  • public class ParameterInfo
extends Object
    Represents parameters of a method, as a replacement for VariableElement.

    This class offers the following benefits compared to VariableElement:

    • it provides access to both the parameter type as well as the parameter name through appropriately named getters and setters
    • it has a String representation suitable for representing the parameter in a parameter list
    • it provides local (i.e., per-parameter) access to the information whether the respective parameter is a varargs parameter)
    Author:
    Malte Isberner
